name: PrismaDROP
description:
Smash blocks and rack up points. Earn prisms. Go from "Incredible" to "Epic". Brag to friends. …and then do it all again—ANYWHERE, ANYTIME.

Ever had an adrenaline rush while waiting in line? PrismaDROP is the fastest, most intense puzzle game for iPhone, iPad and iPod touch. In just 30 seconds you'll smash one hundred glittering blocks and earn thousands of points. Then you'll do it again. And again, and… it's night already?

You'll WANT to be stuck in line!
• An intense, fast puzzle game
• Smash blocks, rack up points, then do it again!
• No timer—the rush to finish each game comes from you
• Infinite levels, for free. Each time you play is a unique experience
